game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has broken, fragments of the past and present collide. As a temporal archaeologist, you must navigate the ever-changing landscape to uncover the secrets of your own existence.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player character waking up in a desolate, ancient city with no memory of who they are or how they got there. A mysterious voice guides them through the ruins, hinting at a catastrophic event that shattered time itself.
game.ending: As you delve deeper into the mysteries of time, you'll uncover a hidden prophecy that speaks of a great convergence – a point where past and present merge, restoring balance to the timestream. With your knowledge and skills, you'll embark on a perilous journey to reach the Convergence Point, facing rival temporal factions, ancient creatures, and unexpected allies along the way. Will you succeed in mending the fabric of time, or will the echoes of eternity forever shatter your world?
